actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to direct the Committee on International Relations to begin an immediate study of the relationship of the United States with the United Nations and to report, within 6 months, to the Speaker of the House of Representatives recommendations with respect to whether the manner and nature of such relationship should be changed.

summary.text: Directs the House of Representatives Committee on International Relations to begin an immediate study of the relationship of the United States with the United Nations and to report, within six months, to the Speaker of the House of Representatives recommendations with respect to whether the manner and nature of such relationship should be changed.

titles.title: Resolution to direct the Committee on International Relations to begin an immediate study of the relationship of the United States with the United Nations and to report, within 6 months, to the Speaker of the House of Representatives recommendations with respect to whether the manner and nature of such relationship should be changed.
